metadata.description:
The complete DIGITAL OMNIBUS of ARMY OF DARKNESS!!

Collects Army of Darkness: Movie Adaptation 1-3, Army of Darkness: Ashes 2 Ashes 1-4, Army of Darkness: Shop Till You Drop Dead 1-4, Army of Darkness vs. ReAnimator 1-4, and Army of Darkness Vol. 1 5-7.
metadata.name: Army of Darkness Omnibus, Vol. 1
